answers.answer: Is this fasting or after meals?
This is very high if it is fasting, it is also too high for after meals.Suggest you get checked by your doctor for diabetes.
this is fasting , i am being treated for diabetes but dont know much about it , i was only diagnosed xmas eve
an a1c will tell u what ur sugar has been at for the past 3 months, either way that is way to igh, talk to your doctors :D good luck
a reading of 11 is way too high for FBS. 4 to 7 mmol/L is the guideline given me.
